statements: SELECT * FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT animal_name, latitude, longitude FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE gps_sensor_id = 10;
SELECT animal_id, timestamp FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT animal_id, animal_name, timestamp FROM WildlifeTracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT animal_name, latitude, longitude FROM WildlifeTracking WHERE gps_sensor_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT animal_name FROM WildlifeTracking;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, MIN(longitude) AS min_longitude, MAX(longitude) AS max_longitude FROM WildlifeTracking;
SELECT animal_name, timestamp FROM WildlifeTracking ORDER BY latitude, longitude;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_tracking;
SELECT id, animal_name, gps_latitude FROM wildlife_tracking ORDER BY animal_name DESC;
SELECT animal_name, gps_latitude, gps_longitude FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE gps_latitude > 40;
SELECT id, timestamp, animal_name FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, status, battery_level FROM sensor_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE gps_latitude > 40 AND gps_longitude < -100;
SELECT animal_name, timestamp FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE animal_name = 'Lion' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, battery_level, status FROM sensor_status WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY battery_level DESC, last_reported_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND gps_latitude > 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT animal_name, gps_latitude, gps_longitude FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM sensor_status WHERE battery_level < 20) ORDER BY animal_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_locations;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, animal_id FROM wildlife_locations WHERE sensor_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM animals ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT animal_species, gender FROM animals WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY animal_species ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, deployed_date FROM sensors WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_locations WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT animal_species, weight FROM animals WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT animal_id, AVG(weight) AS average_weight FROM animals GROUP BY animal_id HAVING AVG(weight) > 50;
SELECT * FROM animals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, species FROM animals WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT animal_id, age, species FROM animals WHERE age > 5;
SELECT name, species, age FROM animals WHERE location_id = 1 AND species = 'Lion';
SELECT * FROM movements WHERE movement_type = 'Migration' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM animals WHERE age > 5;
SELECT species, name, age FROM animals WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM animals;
SELECT animal_id, species, name, age FROM animals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT animal_id, species, name, location_id, sensor_type FROM animals JOIN movements ON animals.animal_id = movements.animal_id;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_location_data;
SELECT animal_name, latitude, longitude FROM wildlife_location_data WHERE id = 23;
SELECT * FROM gps_sensor_data ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT species_name, category FROM wildlife_species WHERE species_id = 7;
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name FROM wildlife_habitat WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_location_data WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT animal_name, latitude, longitude FROM wildlife_location_data WHERE animal_name LIKE 'Lion%' OR animal_name LIKE 'Tiger%';
SELECT sensor_model, battery_level FROM gps_sensor_data WHERE battery_level < 50 AND sensor_model = 'Model-A' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species WHERE category = 'Mammal' OR category = 'Amphibian';
SELECT animal_id, sensor_id, start_timestamp FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE end_timestamp IS NULL ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
